div.style: background-color: White; color: red; font-size: 50px; text-align: center;

a.span: Go to Clear Waters Life Center...

div.p:
4-23-20
C-G Families and Community Members,
I want to give you a quick update on operations of the school right now and how we are preparing to operate through the end of the school year. We have no cases confirmed of COVID-19 in the Clearbrook-Gonvick district at this time. We will continue to monitor and inform you of any updates. Distance Learning will be continuing through the end of the school . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about C-G Families and Community members

div.p:
ALL STUDENT ACCOUNTS FOR SCHOOLOGY WERE UPDATED/UPGRADED AT 7AM TODAY (APRIL 23,2020)
Here is what you need to know or do:
Schoology login web page: clearbrook-gonvick.schoology.com
(NOT SCHOOLOGY.COM ANYMORE-YOU HAVE TO TYPE THE ABOVE ADDRESS IN)
Username: same username or email you were using for Schoology
Password: same password you were using for Schoology
SPREAD THE WORD TO YOUR CLASSMATES, PLEASE!!!

a.aria-label: Read more about UPDATE - PLEASE READ

div.p:
Dear CG students, parents, and community,
Please use the spreadsheet(s) as a guide to help you organize your schoolwork. Parents/Guardians can use them to stay informed of what their students are doing and as a reference point to check their progress.
If you are interested in getting a Schoology code to see what your student is doing in their classes please email one of their teachers for help.
Thanks, Carl Dugstad CG . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Stay informed

div.p:
3-25-20
C-G Families and Community Members,
I want to give you a quick update on operations of the school right now and how we are preparing to operate for the future. We have no cases confirmed of COVID-19 in the Clearbrook-Gonvick district at this time. We will continue to monitor and inform you of any updates. Distance Learning will be starting March 30th and continuing until May 1st. The State plans to resume school on . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about School Operations Update

h3.a: Clearbrook-Gonvick Education Minnesota: Teaching Degree Scholarship

div.p:
Clearbrook-Gonvick Education Minnesota: Teaching Degree Scholarship - This scholarship is for Clearbrook-Gonvick School Alumni with completed undergraduate requirements who are student teaching in their senior year of college Deadline: April 15, 2020
Scholarship form

a.aria-label: Read more about Clearbrook-Gonvick Education Minnesota: Teaching Degree Scholarship

div.p:
Clearbrook-Gonvick Kindness Squad is pleased to take part in the food drive for the Clearwater County Food Shelf via the MN Foodshare March Campaign! During the month of March, we will have boxes set out in the hallways to collect non-perishable food which will be donated to our local food shelf at the end of the month.
Please bring your donations of non-perishables to the school to drop off and we will take care of the . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Food Shelf

div.p:
Best Staff around welcomes everyone to a new school year!!
GO BEARS!!!

a.aria-label: Read more about 2019-2020 Clearbrook-Gonvick Staff

div.h4: NEW: Administrative Assistant/Testing Support, ONGOING: Custodial Subs, Para and teacher subs
div.p:
Application Procedure and Application: Classified Positions
Clearbrook-Gonvick School has an opening for an Administrative Assistant/Testing Support. This is a ten-month position. Need to be able to multi-task , communicate with students , parents, and staff . Computer skills required. Must be able to pass a background check. Please . . .

div.em: Current conditions as of 24 Apr 08:16 am CDT

div.span: Mostly sunny, with a high near 60. North wind 3 to 7 mph.
Partly cloudy, with a low around 36. East wind 3 to 6 mph.

Scattered showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 58. East southeast wind 5 to 7 mph becoming northeast in the afternoon. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.
